lines.english: I’ve got a point to be proving to myself, sitting too long getting mouldy on the shelf
lines.irish: Tá pointe agam le cruthú dom féin, i mo shuí rófhada ag fáil múnla ar an tseilf

lines.english: Cos I’m too far gone when it comes to mental health
lines.irish: Mar tá mé rófhada imithe nuair a bhaineann sé le meabhairshláinte

lines.english: Rather be sick in the head with a little bit of wealth
lines.irish: B'fhearr liom a bheith tinn sa chloigeann le beagán saibhris

lines.english: Tá mé tinn de bheith ag glacadh comhairle stráinséara
lines.irish: I’m sick of taking advice from strangers

lines.english: Mar tá an cinneadh a dhéanann daoine domsa dáinséarach
lines.irish: Because the decisions people make for me are dangerous

lines.english: Ag éirí leadránach, go síoraí ag caint cac’
lines.irish: It’s getting boring, constantly talking shite

lines.english: Níl mé dul a bheith ag éisteacht as seo amach
lines.irish: I’m not going to listen anymore

lines.english: Seasaigí, tú ar do ghlúine they’re doing it to ya constantly
lines.irish: Stand up, you’re on your knees – they’re doing this to you constantly

lines.english: An individual is surely what ya want to be, you’re born to stand out
lines.irish: Is cinnte gur duine uathúil atá uait a bheith, rugadh thú chun seasamh amach

lines.english: Live your fantasy before they eat you up and spit you out and laugh at ye
lines.irish: Mair do bhrionglóid sula n-ithfidh siad thú, casfaidh siad amach thú agus gáire orthu

lines.english: Fan socair, bí díograiseach is cloígh le do phlean mucker
lines.irish: Stay calm, be passionate and stick to your plan mucker

lines.english: There’ll be push backs but relax siocair, gur seo do thriailse
lines.irish: There’ll be setbacks but relax because this is your trial

lines.english: Do shaol atá ann brother
lines.irish: It’s your life, brother

lines.english: It’s a philosophy
lines.irish: Is fealsúnacht í

lines.english: Ní ligim don domhan mór riamh dul i bhfeidhm ar an fhíorshaol atá ar an taobh istigh
lines.irish: I never let the outside world affect the true world within

lines.english: To be affecting me because cibé rud atá le tarlú is always how it’s meant to be
lines.irish: To affect me – because whatever happens is always meant to be

lines.english: So goitse, cogar, cloígh leat féin is ná héist le haon fucker
lines.irish: So come here, listen up, stick to yourself and don’t listen to any fucker

lines.english: Ní thuigeann siad tusa mar a thuigeann tusa tusa, níor shiúil siad i do chosa
lines.irish: They don’t understand you the way you do – they haven’t walked in your shoes

lines.english: So tóg seans, seans go n-éireoidh sé níos fusa
lines.irish: So take a chance, it might get easier

lines.english: I’ve got a point to be proving to myself, sitting too long getting mouldy on the shelf
lines.irish: Tá pointe agam le cruthú dom féin, i mo shuí rófhada ag fáil múnla ar an tseilf

lines.english: Cos I’m too far gone when it comes to mental health
lines.irish: Mar tá mé rófhada imithe maidir le meabhairshláinte

lines.english: Rather be sick in the head with a little bit of wealth
lines.irish: B'fhearr liom a bheith tinn sa chloigeann le beagán saibhris

lines.english: Tá mé tinn de bheith ag glacadh comhairle stráinséara
lines.irish: I’m sick of taking advice from strangers

lines.english: Mar tá an cinneadh a dhéanann daoine domsa dáinséarach
lines.irish: Because the decisions people make for me are dangerous

lines.english: Ag éirí leadránach, go síoraí ag caint cac’
lines.irish: It’s getting boring, always talking shite

lines.english: Níl mé dul a bheith ag éisteacht as seo amach
lines.irish: I’m not going to listen anymore

lines.english: I prayed to the devil, let me be rich instead, he said
lines.irish: Ghuigh mé ar an diabhal, lig dom a bheith saibhir ina áit, dúirt sé

lines.english: “You’ll no longer be skint but you’ll be sick in the head
lines.irish: “Ní bheidh tú bocht níos mó, ach beidh tú tinn sa chloigeann

lines.english: Ní bheidh tú riamh sna sráideanna ach agatsa, beidh fadhbanna
lines.irish: You’ll never be on the streets but you’ll still have problems

lines.english: You want this for náideanna sa bhreis when you’re paid?”
lines.irish: An bhfuil tú ag iarraidh seo ar mhaithe le cúpla giota breise nuair a íoctar thú?”

lines.english: Yes!
lines.irish: Sea!

lines.english: “You’re a mad cunt Mo Chara”
lines.irish: “Is amadán as do mheabhair thú, Mo Chara”

lines.english: Sound! I’ll be back for a fat loan tomorrow, that’s me never getting dressed
lines.irish: Ceart go leor! Beidh mé ar ais le haghaidh iasacht mhór amárach, sin mé gan éirí as mo phjs

lines.english: Depressed and always para, throwing tantrums in my mansion, am I embarrassed? Nah
lines.irish: Dubh dóite agus i gcónaí amhrasach, ag screadaíl i mo mhainéar – náire orm? Ná bac

lines.english: Gach seans go bhfuil mé giota beag ar mire, níl aon dabht maidir liomsa is Mo Chara
lines.irish: There’s every chance I’m a little mad, no doubt about me and Mo Chara

lines.english: Ar strae insa cheann, when we’re smoking then we’re smoking til it’s all done all gone
lines.irish: Cailleadh intinne, nuair atáimid ag caitheamh, caitheann muid go dtí go bhfuil sé uile imithe

lines.english: No half measures til it’s aw naw
lines.irish: Gan leathbhearta go dtí ‘aw naw’

lines.english: But we’re making up our own laws, never getting worried bout our own flaws
lines.irish: Ach déanaimid ár ndlíthe féin, ní chuirimid imní orainn faoi ár lochtanna

lines.english: Fuck a real job, we make our own bob, KNEECAP 3CAG we’re our own Gods
lines.irish: Cuir leis an obair cheart, déanaimid ár gcuid airgid féin, KNEECAP 3CAG is sinne ár Déithe féin

lines.irish: Tá pointe agam le cruthú dom féin, i mo shuí rófhada ag fáil múnla ar an tseilf

lines.irish: Because the decisions people make for me are dangerous

lines.irish: It’s getting boring, constantly talking crap
